subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Giants defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul, who has one sack this year, conceded on Thursday that he is not 100 percent healthy, and won’t be for a while, after off-season back surgery.
snippet: Giants defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul, who has one sack this year, conceded on Thursday that he is not 100 percent healthy, and won’t be for a while, after off-season back surgery.
